Package com.spacetimecat.concurrent

Concurrency library

See: Description

Package com.spacetimecat.concurrent Description

Concurrency library

The message passing style is Gate. You give it a Runnable, and it takes care of acquiring and releasing the lock.

The service oriented style is Lock. The user is responsible for acquiring and releasing the lock.

The primitive

Design

This is rambling.

When objects need to ensure that no more than one of them is using a shared resource at the same time.

There are many enough objects such that sending a message to every participating object is not practical.

We introduce a condition variable that keeps tracks of whether the resource is used.

When a resource cannot be accessed by multiple objects at the same time, it can implement a protocol that allows cooperating users to regulate access.

A user sends the open message to the resource. The resource answers with a boolean whether the user now owns the resource.

A user sends the close message to the resource. The resource answers with a boolean.
